name: Carrots In Guinness
keywords: carrot, maple syrup, shallot, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds carrots, peeled and cut diagonally 1/4-inch thick
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Add carrots and shallots and sauté 3 minutes, until carrots look glazed. Add stout, dill and parsley, reduce heat to low, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, about 8 minutes, until carrots are barely tender.

Stir in maple syrup and salt and pepper to taste. Increase heat to high and cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until liquid barely films pan and carrots. Stir in lemon juice, check seasoning and serve.
